description: Server-side entry point for handling HTTP requests in a Remix application, managing server rendering with streaming and bot detection.

methods.name: handleRequest
methods.description: Main function to handle incoming HTTP requests, setting CORS headers and delegating to bot or browser request handlers.

methods.name: handleBotRequest
methods.description: Handles server-side rendering when the request comes from a bot, streaming the React app's output.

methods.name: handleBrowserRequest
methods.description: Handles server-side rendering for browser requests, streaming the React app's output.
